# mssql_database (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mssql_database" "example" {

    name = "example"
    recovery_mode = "FULL"
    collation = "SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS"
    
}
```

### Required

- **collation** (String)
- **recovery_mode** (String)
